articles.title: Global player? EU summit to seek answers on China, U.S. strategy - Reuters
articles.description: The European Union's 27 leaders will seek a new approach to China on Tuesday in their first summit on Sino-European strategy since the bloc imposed sanctions on Beijing in March and faced retaliation, jeopardising a new investment pact.
articles.content: BRUSSELS, Oct 5 (Reuters) - The European Union's 27 leaders will seek a new approach to China on Tuesday in their first summit on Sino-European strategy since the bloc imposed sanctions on Beijing in… [+2189 chars]

articles.author: Morgan McFall-Johnsen
articles.title: A European-Japanese spacecraft snapped the clearest photo of Mercury in 6 years as it flew past the planet - Yahoo News
articles.description: The BepiColombo spacecraft just flew past Mercury — its ultimate destination — for the first time. The resulting photos reveal a moon-like surface.
articles.content:
Mercury is finally back in the spotlight, with a space probe zooming past its cratered surface for the first time in six years.
As it flew past Mercury on Friday, the BepiColombo spacecraft snapped … [+2722 chars]

articles.title: EU regulator backs Pfizer vaccine booster for all adults after 6 months - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Study indicates third shot increases antibodies against COVID-19.
articles.content:
Europes drugs regulator on Monday advised that healthy adults can receive a third, booster dose of the BioNTech/Pfizer COVID-19 vaccine six months after the second dose.
